name: SDOH_DOM_CONFIG_SOURCES
description: This table stores the sources that identify a patient's social risk factors or social needs for a social determinants of health domain configuration.

columns.name: DOM_CONFIG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the domain configuration record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SRC_DOM_CONFIG_ID
columns.description: A unique social determinants domain configuration identifier that consists of the social determinants domain configuration ID. This column is often used for grouping, sorting, and display purposes in reports.

columns.name: SOURCES_OVERRIDE_DISP_NAME
columns.description: The override display name of the social determinant domain configuration record.
